    • solar2Lunar

      public static org.javatuples.Quartet<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> solar2Lunar​(int y, int m, int d, int timezone)
      Convert a solar date to a Vietnamese lunar date
      Parameters:
      y - year (example 2022)
      m - month (based 1) (example 8)
      d - day of month (based 1) (example 28)
      timezone - offset timezone from GTM (0-23). GTM+7: timezone =7, GMT-1: timezone=23
      Returns:
      Quartet with (year,month, day, isLeapYear) of lunar date

    • lunar2Sonar

      public static org.javatuples.Triplet<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> lunar2Sonar​(int lunarYear, int lunarMonth, int lunarDay, boolean isLeap, int timezone)
      Convert a lunar date to a solar date
      Parameters:
      lunarYear - the lunar year
      lunarMonth - the lunar month
      lunarDay - the lunar day
      isLeap - this year is a leap year
      timezone - the timezone
      Returns:
      A triplet with (year,month,day) for solar date
